name: DEVELOPMENT CENTRE FOR ALTERNATIVE POLICIES
briefDescription: DCAP’s mission is to actively participate in the sustenance of pluralism and diversity in all spheres of life - environmental, social, cultural, economic and political - for achieving peaceful co-existence within human society and with nature.DCAP’s Activities Revolve Around The Following Thematic AreasLaw and GovernanceWater Resources Conservation and DevelopmentEnvironmentally Sustainable Agriculture.S & T Application for Local Governance
